title: Decreasing adm int rates increases AD

content.prompt: Which of the following will most likely result in an increase in aggregate demand?

choices.label: An increase in the interest rates charged on credit card balances
A disruption in global oil supply
A decrease in the central bankâ€™s administered interest rates
A reduction of pay and benefits for government employees
A decrease in the wealth of households

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
